go work init .
go work use $STATSVIZ_MODULE

cp $STATSVIZ_MODULE/_example/iris/main.go .

# Start an HTTP server with a statsviz endpoint
go build main.go
exec ./main &
checkui http://localhost:8088/debug/statsviz/

-- go.mod --
module example/iris

go 1.18

require (
	github.com/kataras/iris/v12 v12.1.8
)
